::: {.hero-section}
Hi! I am **Isidora Araya Day**, a theoretical condensed matter physicist working on mesoscopic physics, topology and quantum transport.

Currently, I am a PhD student in the [Quantum Tinkerer group](http://quantumtinkerer.group/) at TU Delft, working with [Anton Akhmerov](https://antonakhmerov.org/) and [Michael Wimmer](https://michaelwimmer.org/).
:::
